content.description: With your right hand on the small blocky pocket, work up the arete with your left until you gain a high foot. Move up into a shallow dish and top out.
content.protection: Good landing, except the sticks behind you.
content.location: Left side of the Circus Tent Boulder. Right hand starts in the small blocky pocket used as the left hand start for Opening Act. Left hand starts on a small, blocky hold on the arete.

content.description: Start left hand in the small blocky pocket in the middle of the boulder and a right hand on the small crimp on the right side of the face. Throw for the flat ledge up right, then up to the blunt arete/seam with the left. Establish a high left foot/heel before or after the left. Then, scoot your way up the face as you bump the left on a crappy small dish and a bomber mono. Top out.
content.location: Start left hand on the small blocky pocket. Right hand on a small crimp on the face. Straight up.

content.description:
Start with both hands on the left arete. Feet are the left lip and/or a low right dish. Work through a small crimp on the lip, the 2 finger shallow pocket and far right crimp (both start hands for Opening Act V2). Turn the corner and mantle.

Circus Tent Traverse V5
content.location: Both hands start on the left arete. Lip and/or low right dish for feet.
